meta:
w=w in win. j=y in yum. 
ʃ and ʒ are consonants. The marks ˊ and ˋ indicate high and low tone, respectively.
train: I saw the banana on the plate.
The sorcerers met the man in the cave.
There are stars in the sky.
I saw the men in the square.
I met my sorcerer in Luanda.
Did I see the roosters in the cave?
Did the people eat the banana in Luanda?
test: I saw the sorcerer in the sky.
The sky is above the stars.
My friend saw the banana in Luanda.
The person met the sorcerer and the friend in the square.
